name: Tatsuya Akutsu
content: Tatsuya Akutsu Home Page Welcome to Tatsuya Akutsu's Home Page Japanese Version Profile Tatsuya Akutsu was born in February 23, 1962. He received B.Eng. and M.Eng. in Aeronautics and D.Eng. in Information Engineering from University of Tokyo, 1984, 1986 and 1989, respectively. From 1989 to 1994, he was with Mechanical Engineering Laboratory. From 1994 to 1996, he was an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Gunma University. From 1996 to 2001, he was an Associate Professor in Human Genome Center, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo. Since 2001, he has been a Professor in Bioinformatics Center, Institute for Chemical Research, Kyoto University. His research interests include bioinformatics and the design and analysis of algorithms. Professor. office:	Bioinformatics Center, Institute for Chemical Research, Kyoto University. Uji, Kyoto 611-0011, Japan. fax:	+81-774-38-3022 e-mail:	takutsu AT kuicr DOT kyoto-u DOT ac DOT jp Papers UP
